About Me

Irish Junior Full Stack Web Developer based in Düsseldorf

Hi I'm Dave Mullally, a Full-Stack Web Developer from Wickow, Ireland but based in Düsseldorf, Germany. Through the 3 month long remote Web Development Bootcamp at Ironahack that I had the pleasure of attending I gained invaluable experience in Javascript (ES6), MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS, HTML & CSS. I also had the pleasure of working on 3 projects (2 in pair progamming and one one my own) all of which I am very proud of. I am extremely passionate about building MERN stack applications that follow a Mobile-First approach, as they allow me to expess my creative side while also providing interesting problem solving challanges that help me continue to grow as a developer.
